segments.text: Excuse me , would you tell me how to return to Hilton Hotel . I'm afraid I lost my way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you have hotel card or something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , I have the address and hotel telephone number here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you stay at the down town Hilton . When you go down two blocks this way and turn left , you will find it on your right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't understand very well . Could you give me a map ?
segments.speaker: S1
